title: Buying a PC

body: So basically I am a new LoL player and I am still a beginner in gaming. I am thinking of buying  a PC or laptop  which i am going to use it for studying but mostly playing LoL and CS:GO. I dont want to waste a ton of money because as i said i am still a beginner and i dont need to play in max graphics. I want suggestions on what to buy and plzz dont tell me to make my own because i live in a small country  and you cant find all the pieces needed to make your own pc. In the link i found a laptop which suits my budget and seems good.  Thank you for helping me

replies.body:
words of advice... 
For laptops go with intel as amd is absolute trash.
A good gaming laptop is usually around 1400 usd. 
I have a 1070m with 24gb of ram in mine, but then again i also play farcry 4 and witcher 3 at max settings.

Also make sure your graphics card is good, googling the laptop model will usually give you a spec outlook.

At a glance it looks like that laptop meets the [**minimum specs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654), and your best bet would be to compare any of the parts to those min specs yourself. I'd hate to say something like "go for it, it'll be great" and it not meet your own standards.
